reasons_to_visit.details: Ghost tours, Samhuinn Fire Festival, and storytelling nights.
Holyrood Park and the Royal Botanic Garden showcase vibrant colours.

reasons_to_reconsider.details: Mid-month break increases family crowds at museums.
Sunset before 6pm; plan earlier outdoor adventures.

weather.precipitation: Cool rain with occasional clear, crisp days.
weather.general_tips: Layer sweaters, scarves, and waterproof jacket.

tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Cozy and creative with literary events.
